Malthael.name: Soul Rip
Malthael.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and healing Malthael for 25 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

Malthael.name: Wraith Strike
Malthael.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

Malthael.name: Death Shroud
Malthael.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

Malthael.name: Tormented Souls
Malthael.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

Malthael.name: Last Rites
Malthael.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

Malthael.name: Reaper's Mark
Malthael.description: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

1.name: Fear the Reaper
1.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

4.name: Die Alone
4.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

4.name: Throwing Shade
4.description: Quest: Hit 15 Heroes with Death Shroud.  Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 3.75 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

4.name: Black Harvest
4.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cold Hand
7.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Massacre
7.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

7.name: Touch of Death
7.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Tormented Souls
10.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Last Rites
10.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

13.name: Soul Siphon
13.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Ethereal Existence
13.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

16.name: Mortality
16.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Memento Mori
16.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.
